programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A fellow detective asks the SVU for help when he suspects his two daughters are being groomed by a serial predator; Kat disobeys the captain's orders.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A desperate father takes matters into his own hands in the case against his daughter's rapist.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives uncover a shocking theory as they work to learn the identity of a man Rollins arrested for exposing himself in the park; Detective Benson finds herself in mortal danger.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Featuring a preview of USA's new series, The Rainmaker.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU squad searches for Detective Benson and her abductor (Pablo Schreiber).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 7-year-old girl escapes from her rapist, detectives Benson and Stabler begin an intensive search for the predator.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The life of a law-abiding engineer (Robin Williams) goes terribly wrong, leading him to challenge authority and to urge others to do so as well.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 5-year-old boy is found dead, suspicion falls on his unstable 13-year-old neighbor, whose mental problems began after he was abused at a camp recommended by the dead child's father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler suspect the drug-dealing uncle of a girl (Shareeka Epps) found raped and beaten, but the theft of the rape kit identifying her attacker leads them to a crooked prison guard.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Elliot Stabler puts his marriage at risk when he goes under cover to gain access to an animal-smuggling ring, with Olivia posing as a prostitute.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler help a repeat rape victim (Jennifer Love Hewitt) stand up to her attacker; the investigation leads Benson to Los Angeles, where she meets a detective (Skeet Ulrich) with information that could help the victim get justice.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight's new Internal Affairs handler proves to be suspicious of his actions; Voight must work with his former partner from the Gang Unit; Halsted enlists Jin to help him gather more information on Lonnie Rodiger; Olinsky takes Ruzek down a peg.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Burgess and Atwater come across a gunshot victim and the only witness is Olinsky's daughter; Ruzek goes to Burgess for help with an undercover mission.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Halstead's badge is revoked when Lonnie Rodiger is found dead; Severide (Taylor Kinney) and Clarke (Peter Mills) find Dr. Elliot's torso; Sumner (Sydney Tamiia Poitier) tries to prove herself; Lindsay shares a moment with Severide.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Dueling gangs are suspected when a massacre occurs and $8 million is stolen; Platt asks Ruzek for help.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As Voight and his team search for the bombers, they realize there might be more bombs set to detonate; Burgess' niece fights for her life.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Cmdr. Perry notifies the unit that Pulpo has been released to help with a case; Ruzek gets difficult news; when a bit of Lindsay's past resurfaces, Voight reminds her how far she's come.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Platt and Voight discuss their pasts; Jin uses a scapegoat when he is caught tinkering with Voight's computer; Lindsay realizes she needs to come clean.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide realizes he shares a similar past with the lieutenant who has been helping out at the firehouse; Dawson shares a secret with Shay; Casey faces family issues.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Dawson turns to an unlikely source for assistance as she tries to help her brother; Severide does a favor for Lt. Whaley; Herrmann and Otis make tough discoveries about their silent partner.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Cruz puts himself and his fellow firefighters in danger; Casey tries to resolve issues with his sister and mother; the team assists the bomb squad with a dangerous call.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: When Severide's father (Treat Williams) visits, he clashes with Chief Boden over a former colleague's death; Shay makes a decision about Clarice; the mystery about Herrmann, Otis and Dawson's bar is revealed.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Mills questions Bennie about the fire that killed Mills' father; Casey, Severide and Bennie investigate two mysterious diner fires.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A failed rescue attempt deeply affects the men and women of firehouse 51; Dawson and Shay deal with a junkie's crazy behavior during a call; the team upsets local drug dealers.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A paramedic candidate joins Shay and Dawson for a few shifts; Cindy Herrmann experiences pregnancy complications while her husband is out of town; Casey receives an unexpected visit.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: New York City becomes the bullet-riddled playground of a former assassin (Keanu Reeves) as he hunts down the Russian mobsters who destroyed everything he held dear.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Legendary hit man John Wick comes out of retirement when a former associate plots to seize control of an international assassins' guild. Bound by a blood oath to help him, Wick travels to Rome to square off against the world's deadliest killers.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: New York City becomes the bullet-riddled playground of a former assassin (Keanu Reeves) as he hunts down the Russian mobsters who destroyed everything he held dear.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An abused foster child (Jae Head), apprehended while driving a runaway van, leads the detectives to re-examine a case involving a rape victim (Sara Gilbert).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teen named Eric admits to looking at a Web site in an attempt to curb pedophilic urges toward his stepbrother; when Eric goes missing, the stepfather (Tom Noonan) is questioned.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the body of a 14-year-old girl is found in the Hudson River, Benson and Stabler think she was smuggled into the country by sex traffickers; in an attempt to identify her, Benson poses as a madam.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Serial arsonist on the loose leaves no evidence.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man becomes the prime suspect in his wife's death after forensic science raises questions about her apparent suicide.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a federal prison inmate who was the adopted daughter of a notorious counterfeiter; Callen is summoned by the ATF Internal Affairs board to discuss Anna Kolcheck's actions.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sam is shot during a firefight with the cartel; an interrogated suspect reveals new information on the whereabouts of Spencer Williams, the man who kidnapped Mosley's son.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Despite several team members having reservations, the team travels to Mexico to locate and rescue Mosley's son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler begin to question the story of a missing teenager (Ellen Woglom) who returns home after four years, claiming to have been kept as a sex slave in a concrete cell.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man is found badly beaten in a parking lot, with no memory of what happened, and detectives suspect his transgender teen may be responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mute girl is raped and beaten, and her drawing of her attacker resembles a local priest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An artist's shocking death leads detectives to uncover a long string of murders by an elusive serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 2-year-old girl goes missing, her irresponsible young mother (Hilary Duff) becomes the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Officer Nate Kendall (Wentworth Miller) helps a woman in trouble and gets roped into investigating a rape; when evidence connects multiple cases, the team realizes there may be a serial rapist responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson suspect a sugar daddy (Matt C. Burns) of murder when a young woman's body is found stuffed inside a suitcase.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman goes missing, her boyfriend points Detectives Benson and Stabler in the direction of convicted bank robber Callum Donovan (Stephen Rea); to comprehend the impact of solitary confinement, Stabler experiences it.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate when a 10-year-old girl goes missing.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives try to identify a girl who is so traumatized after being raped that she cannot tell them her name.

programme.desc: Legendary hit man John Wick comes out of retirement when a former associate plots to seize control of an international assassins' guild. Bound by a blood oath to help him, Wick travels to Rome to square off against the world's deadliest killers.
